mention.text: 17 jan 90 -- after listening to reports submitted by the interior and foreign ministers , the bolivian senate today approved the government 's decision to extradite colonel luis arce gomez to the united states , where he faces charges of drug trafficking
arce gomez , who has been charged with murder , organizing repressive groups , and protecting narcotraffic
